reviewText: Crossing South is a very informative collection that gives a good feel for Baja California and it's people.  I had great service with the delivery of the DVD Set.

Besides being very fun and refreshing to watch, I've learned a lot from the places featured. There's a lot more to do and enjoy in northern Mexico that I had no idea was there, also some great restaurants and hidden treasures that I want to try now.
Though I didn't buy from Amazon, it's nice to know they carry it now. There's a second season on PBS too.
